author: Justin Vallejo, Justin Vallejo
title: Coronavirus: US senators accused of insider trading named on Trump committee to reopen trading
description: 'To provide counsel to the president on the reopening of America'
content:
Senators accused of insider trading to profit from the coronavirus shutdown of the US economy have been named on the committee to reopen the US economy.
Georgia Republicans Kelly Loeffler and David Perdue were appointed to the White House's task force to reo… [+1701 chars]
